LanguageData.RawShimmershroom.label: shimmershroom
LanguageData.RawShimmershroom.description: Raw shimmershroom. Its delicate taste and nutrition qualities are much appreciated by caveworlds inhabitants.
LanguageData.RawGlowbulb.label: glowbulb
LanguageData.RawGlowbulb.description: Raw glowbulb. While being nutritious, its very rough taste make it better used as a cooked ingredient.
LanguageData.GleamcapStem.label: gleamcap stem
LanguageData.GleamcapStem.description: A massive gleamcap stem. Known for its natural healing properties by caveworld tenders, it can be used to treat injuries and ease the pain.
LanguageData.RawGiantLeaf.label: giant leaf
LanguageData.RawGiantLeaf.description: Raw giant leaf. Not really appetizing raw, it is better prepared as a soup.
